column1: Local Foods////The only drawback with this place is the parking ! I've had to leave twice because there was nowhere to park (not even street parking! I was willing to walk 3 blocks but there was nothing!) I know this is out of their control
column2: but it's pretty sad leaving your house thinking you're going to eat something yummy
column3: and coming back to cook something crappy because you couldn't find parking :-(. #houstonproblems
